title: Irresistible
overview: Mussaya's father is kicked out (along with his wife and child) of the Rattanamahasarn family for marrying a girl from a "low class" Malay woman. Both parents having passed away early she was brought up by her maternal grandfather. Years later Mussaya grows up as a free spirited, boyish and a little crude woman . Head of Rattanamahasarn family feeling sad and guilty about the past orders her grandson Luck to bring back Mussaya. Mussaya after coming back to Rattanamahasarn family feels like a outcast with overbearing rules, etiquette and a family who looks down on her. She can only feel comfortable with Luck as her true self while she constanly faces bullying from stepsisters and their mother.
